meanings.definition: A disorderly or tumultuous gathering of people.
meanings.sent1: The derays at the concert made it hard to see the stage.
meanings.sent2: The derays in the market caused chaos and confusion.
meanings.sent3: The derays at the birthday party led to spilled drinks and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The derays of emotions in the room were palpable.
meanings.sent5: The derays of fans rushing towards the stage was overwhelming.
